data.name: Bent on Destruction
data.detailed_description:
Be sure to check out the Demo available now! Click link on right side of this page.

Bent on Destruction introduces groundbreaking building destruction with a fast-paced projectile battle. These structures are flexible which means they will bend and twist before collapsing in spectacular fashion. The meanies won’t just stand around while you destroy their building though, they fight back, and you must act quickly to outsmart them.

• 7 unique demo levels
• Incredible real-time 3D building destruction
• Relentless enemies
• Power-ups
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Bent on Destruction is a 3D projectile launching battle game featuring realistic building destruction! Topple the towers and use your power-ups to defeat the meanies. Experience a revolutionary new building destruction engine.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 2GB
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 4 Ghz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 4GB
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
